testCases.label: Verify mathPow computes 2^2 correctly
testCases.description: Checks that mathPow(2, 2) returns 4 using double comparison with a small delta.

testCases.label: Verify mathPow computes 3^4 correctly
testCases.description: Checks that mathPow(3, 4) returns 81 using double comparison with a small delta.
